physical_appearance: The image displays a bottle. It has an opener that is maroon in colour. The body of the bottle is light blue in colour and the motif of a gold-coloured crane can be seen. Below the crane on the front and sides of the bottle, there are several lines of Kanji displayed in yellow. At front of the bottle in the middle, a five pointed star and a stake with two crossed rifles are featured. There are designs of flowers and leaves around the body of the bottle.
sgcool_label_text: This sake bottle belonged to a Japanese officer from the Imperial Army, which contains the Kikusui flag and crane in the design.
title_text: World War II Japanese officer sake bottle
subject_terms_2: World War, 1939 - 1945 Rice wines Motifs Japan. Rikugun Wine bottles
